oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sánchez Parra, Patricia
Gil, Victoria
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Trabajo Fin de Máster: Reflections upon my personal growth as an English Teacher
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: syllabus learning unit
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a dissertion in which I reflect on two important works: the syllabus and the learning unit, showing my personal growth during this year as an English teacher, highlighting some of the most important ideas to take into account in my future career.
